subject: Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Anthony Bosch, who ran the Biogenesis anti-aging clinic, told “60 Minutes” that a fear of needles had led Alex Rodriguez to ask him to administer injections.
snippet: Anthony Bosch, who ran the Biogenesis anti-aging clinic, told “60 Minutes” that a fear of needles had led Alex Rodriguez to ask him to administer injections.
